get.summary: Retrieve information about member account status for membership suspension
get.description: Returns information about member account to be suspended.   #### Required authorization requires `members:suspendMembership` grant

200.description: details about member account important for membership suspension

403.description: User is not allowed to perform requested operation

404.description: Missing required user authentication or authentication failed

put.summary: Suspend membership for a club member
put.description: Suspends membership for a club member.   If there are some blockers (debt, etc), it responds with HTTP '409' unless `force=true` parameter was used.  #### Required authorization requires `members:suspendMembership` grant

200.description: Membership of club member was suspended successfully

401.description: Missing required user authentication or authentication failed

403.description: User is not allowed to perform requested operation

404.description: Missing required user authentication or authentication failed

409.description: It's not possible to suspend membership for club member. See response body for actual reason(s). You may use `force` to override these reasons.

post.description: Registers a new club member with the provided details.  #### Required authorization requires `members:register` grant

401.description: Missing required user authentication or authentication failed

403.description: User is not allowed to perform requested operation

409.description: Conflict - Member already exists (usually registration was submitted with existing registration number)

get.summary: Get recommended registration number for sex and date of birth

200.description: Recommended (available) registration number for new member registration

401.description: Missing required user authentication or authentication failed

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,(asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: Defines how many data are returned for every item

MembershipSuspensionInfoRequestDto.description: Forces membership suspension for member even if there are some reasons (like negative finance account balance, etc..) why it would be wise to postpone user membership suspension

force.description: tells if member account should be suspended even when there are some unfinished things (canSuspend=false)

country.description: two letter country code, ISO 3166-1 alpha-2

Contact.description: At least one of email or phone value is required

email.description: Email address of the club member or guardian

phone.description: Phone number of the club member or guardian

EditMyDetailsForm.description: Member attributes which can be updated by member himself (member can update some own attributes)    #### Required authorization - user can edit own member data   Additional validations: - either contact or at least 1 guardian needs to be entered

nationality.description: two letter country code, ISO 3166-1 alpha-2

bankAccount.description: Bank account number of the club member IBAN

dietaryRestrictions.description: Dietary restrictions of the club member

medicCourse.description: Whether the club member has completed the medic course

number.description: Personal identification number of the club member

expiryDate.description: Expiry date of the ID card, YYYY-MM-DD

relatedItem.description: User friendly description of the error

instance.description: URI of the resource which has thrown the error

EditAnotherMemberDetailsForm.description: Member attributes editable by authorized user who can change details about other members  #### Required authorization - requires `members:edit` grant  Additional validations:  - when `CZ` is selected as nationality, then `birthCertificateNumber` is required value

lastName.description: Last name of the club member

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the club member

birthCertificateNumber.description: Birth certificate number for Czech citizens

nationality.description: two letter country code, ISO 3166-1 alpha-2

instance.description: URI of the resource which has thrown the error

isSuspended.description: tells if member account is currently suspended

canSuspend.description: tells if member account can be suspended

SuspendMembershipBlockers.description: describes conditions which may prevent membership suspension and their actual status

status.description: tells if finance account balance permits membership suspension
